text:
I am not sure if this is something anyone has also experienced before and can help me with but in my google postmaster tools i keep seeing my domain SPF records getting pass/fail constantly.

I want to know why is this happening and how to fix this.
ok thank you, I'll see if I get another ticket in support because the one that I already sent told that they don't know and that they don't have the skills to know the reason why that's happening

Is it possible to send a user to a certain thank you page based on a form field submission? For instance, if they select one option, they are sent to thank you page A; and if they select another option, they are sent to thank you page B
I know there was talks a while ago but nothing active at this point to my knowledge
does anyone know why outlook and other mobil clients ignore the font size of the newsletter email?  i have set the font in px,pt,% and em but all get ignored
Not out of the box but it is possible if you switch to an inline thank you then use a javascript event listener

`window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {`
`   if(event.data.type === 'hsFormCallback' && event.data.eventName === 'onFormSubmit') {`
then just create an if statement around whatever form field value you need and set the window location as needed
Has anyone run into any difficulty removing the drift integration from their HubSpot site?
Removed from header and also disabled both on HubSpot and drift, still pops up; i think it's stuck!

Not with Drift, but had a similar issue with regular HubSpot bot. I disabled it across all pages, cleared cache, checked multiple devices, but the bot kept showing up. HubSpot just turned the bot back on and then turned it off again and it disappeared
so without trying to sound like a smart ass...have you tried turning it on and off again?

:confused:  issue is I cant turn it off because HubSpot doesn't have an integration on there side anymore (I think)
and drift one isnt /cant be turned on without a pro account
Hm, then yeah, it's probably worth submitting a ticket with Drift and/or HubSpot
Thanks for your help!!
Hi, is there an option to add Login with Facebook to my HubSpot site?
No problem
Not out the box there is not

i know inbound labs has a product in beta (i believe its in beta still) called booya that has this <https://w.inboundlabs.co/booya>

<@U22PKFRU5> is anyone from inboundlabs on this slack that you know of?
<@U27V4MTK9> :point_up_2:
At your service ;)
What do you need to do exactly?

Hi there,
I am new to the group. Thx  :smiley:
Hi, where I will get the design manager?
Welcome to the group.  You can get to the design manager via `Marketing>Files and Templates>Design Tools`
OK, thanks
